name: @shopify/screenshot-glb
description: A command line utility for taking screenshots of a glTF 2.0 binary file using Google's <model-viewer> component.

scripts.dev: yarn build && node dist/cli.js -i ./test/fixtures/WaterBottle.glb -o output.jpg -w 1024 -h 2048 -f image/jpeg -q 1.00 -v -t 30000 -m "exposure=0.92&camera-orbit=88.59deg 59.01deg 0.24m&camera-target=0.06m 0.04m 0m&environment-image=neutral"

author: Stephan Leroux <stephan.leroux@shopify.com>
